attributes.review: I wanted this app to keep up with the latest trump campaign news, but if I’m totally honest I have never seen a more glitchy app. I kept getting really random notifications and every time I entered the app it just either lead me to a random screen or exited me out of the app completely! Horrible and disgusting.
attributes.title: Horrible and glitchy!!

attributes.review: Everything about this application is terrible. It glitches constantly, and it keeps spamming my phone with notifications that say “Bunker Boy.” I am very disappointed in how useless and ugly this app is. I will be deleting it by November 3rd. I would recommend using the app “Team Joe Campaign” instead, as it is far superior.
attributes.title: The worst app I’ve ever used

attributes.review: As soon as I opened this app, I saw an image of a homophobic, rapist, and racist orange man!! My eyes were scarred! After I washed that terrible image out of my mind, I decided to at least give the app a chance, THE APP WAS TERRIBLE!  Honestly, I will never ever  download or look at this app again because that orange man gave me nightmares and the things he says.... I think I would rather have a dog as president! 😡DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!! ❌
attributes.title: WORST APP!!

attributes.review: first of all i downloaded the app so i could show my undying support for president trump 😍😍. but then something happened. they hacked my phone and then they changed my wallpaper to a picture of him naked. his microscopic pp blinded me and i had to go to the hospital. the bill was 982,000 dollars and i could barely afford to pay it. i had to get my life savings from my piggy bank😱😱🙏😢. donald trump deserves to go to jail he scammed me and my family and ruined my phone. good night and do not get this disgusting app. i used to support him but i became educated after this! never again! 😝🙉🙏😇🙈😭😭😭🤪🤪🤪
attributes.title: this app is just awful

attributes.review: I have NEVER seen an app so full of racism and hate. I completely regret my vote in 2016- and Trump has the audacity to pretend to run as a “Christian President!” Sacrilegious! This is an awful app with a terrible setup. I can’t just enter the app- it makes me sign up for all kinds of extra stuff that I didn’t really want to sign up for. Overall, a poor excuse for an app.
attributes.title: A very hateful app

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to see when the next rally was- I was too busy watering my fish to go to the last one and had to make it up. 
When I opened the app, I was horrified to see Cheeto smut! I am now completely blind in both eyes because the only way to get the horrible things I’ve seen out was bleach.
attributes.title: Honestly one of the worst apps ever 😭

attributes.review: I got the app and a second later my house began to shake. I was like omg what could it be and as soon as I swiped of the app it stopped, I was curious so I opened it again and then I fell down the stairs and had to call the ambulance. HORRIBLE APP, it’s haunted and just gives the worst to people be CAREFUL when using this app I wouldn’t want anything bad to happen to anyone else. Stay safe loves❤️
attributes.title: DISGUSTING APP

attributes.title: Horrible app
